sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Congressional Redistricting Act of 2021.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the Illinois Congressional Redistricting Act of 2021.

sections.heading: Findings.   In enacting this redistricting plan, the General Assembly finds and declares all of the following:
sections.text: Findings. In enacting this redistricting plan, the General Assembly finds and declares all of the following:

sections.heading: Congressional Districts. The State of Illinois is divided into 17 Congressional Districts as set forth in this Section.
sections.text: Congressional Districts. The State of Illinois is divided into 17 Congressional Districts as set forth in this Section.

sections.heading: The Illinois Congressional Reapportionment Act of 2001 is repealed.
sections.text: The Illinois Congressional Reapportionment Act of 2001 is repealed.

sections.heading: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.
sections.text: Severability. The provisions of this Act are severable under Section 1.31 of the Statute on Statutes.

sections.heading: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
sections.text: Effective date. This Act takes effect upon becoming law.
